title: What is the terminology for QR codes? - Quora

response.answer_text: QR codes mean that following the concepts of technologies, and how they begin to help lives get better and easier, simply put, QR codes are helpful in various industries and individuals such as families. Through these features, QR codes are able to present themselves well into communities, and provide satisfaction, balanced living, and inability to meddle with businesses that are start-ups and handling competition. QR Stuff is one of the websites that you can use to begin your journey into the field of how tech helps lives be easier, better. Jon Lee August Content Creator, Digital PR for Visualead/QR Stuff
